Package mods.railcraft.api.tracks

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IRoutingTrack
    This interface provides a means for addons to hook into Routing Tracks and change the ticket on the fly.
    ITrackBlocksMovement  
    ITrackCustomPlaced
    Have your ITrackInstance implement this to override normal track placement.
    ITrackCustomShape
    Used by rails that modify the bounding boxes.
    ITrackEmitter
    Tracks that can emit a redstone signal should implement this interface.
    ITrackInstance
    This interface defines a track.
    ITrackItemIconProvider  
    ITrackLockdown
    Any rail tile entity that can completely halt all cart movement should implement this interface.
    ITrackPowered
    Implementing this interface will allow your track to be powered via Redstone.
    ITrackReversable
    Implementing this interface will allow your track to be direction specific.
    ITrackSwitch  
    ITrackTile
    Don't use this, its an interface that allows other API code access to internal functions of the code.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RailTools
    A number of utility functions related to rails.
    TrackInstanceBase
    All ITrackInstances should extend this class.
    TrackRegistry
    The TrackRegistry is part of a system that allows 3rd party addons to simply, quickly, and easily define new Tracks with unique behaviors without requiring that any additional block ids be used.
    TrackSpec
    Each type of Track has a single instance of TrackSpec that corresponds with it.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ITrackSwitch.ArrowDirection  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TrackRegistry.TrackIdConflictException
